messages.message: @BG FYI here is another thread. Design is collecting the feedback

Thanks. Just adding an item on to this, When we are already indexing the tables across the document by numbering them can we while writing the field extraction refer to that indexation? often the extraction of the table on the document when i click on the table icon is better than the model extracting it in the table extraction datatype
@BG this is before it is turned into a field right?

Yes. Just by clicking on the table view on document. The extraction is better than turning it into a field. So I was wondering why canâ€™t we refer to the intrinsic table indexes for generating prompts

Yeah we have feedback on this as well, will also pull in @Vishnu + @danny.lan since this was a direct we wanted to go (and will likely after iteration) for highlighting based prompt. We should be able to interact with the table and then get the name as the answer for the prompt ideally
